0: After leaving his partners in the dust, the cunning and thoughtful Lyona Abramov, started closing one deal after the next
9.082512: Under his leadership, the tiny trade hub grew into a large stop for every self-respecting caravan
16.34852: The success, however, was short-lived, since in time, the caravans coming through Peregon started to get attacked by violent gangs, led by experienced veterans of the former trade hub guard regiment…
